messages.message:
Hey everyone, just fyi that I’m planning to migrate us from Node 18 to Node 22 within the next couple weeks! :gudetama-wow-yay: Security support for 18 is ending next week

I’ll start with Admiral and Deployment Manager as I imagine those will be pretty painless, and then tackle the platform. Will definitely be using this channel to source help in case of any issues with the platform :fearful:

thank you for tackling this!

fyi we will need to upgrade the nodes we use to run CI as well

that was a major challenge during the last node upgrade, which aayush did
ah definitely, planning to coordinate w/ Cody to make sure that we can also support having multiple Node versions in CI at once so we can do a phased rollout too
